title: Education Center
desc: A mobile-first learning app UI focused on simplicity and engagement.
Designed key flows including onboarding, course browsing, and progress tracking.
Used a clean color palette and friendly visuals to enhance user experience.

title: Travel Guy
desc: Landing page concept for a modern travel and tourism website.
Focused on visual storytelling using high-quality imagery and vibrant layout.
Designed sections for featured destinations, packages, and user testimonials.

title: Instagram for Vision Pro
desc: Concept UI for Instagram on Apple Vision Pro.
Adapted the experience to spatial interfaces and 3D interactions.
Emphasized gesture-based navigation and immersive content viewing.

title: Glass Morphism Icons
desc: A stylish set of UI icons designed with glassmorphism aesthetics.
Ideal for futuristic interfaces and dashboards with translucent effects.
Designed for consistency, scalability, and clean integration into mobile/web UIs.
